document_notes.text:
This update for gnutls fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2022-2509: Fixed a double free issue during PKCS7 verification (bsc#1202020).
- CVE-2021-4209: Fixed null pointer dereference in MD_UPDATE (bsc#1196167).
document_notes.title: Details

notes.text: A NULL pointer dereference flaw was found in GnuTLS. As Nettle's hash update functions internally call memcpy, providing zero-length input may cause undefined behavior. This flaw leads to a denial of service after authentication in rare circumstances.
notes.title: Vulnerability Description

description.text: To install this SUSE Security Update use the SUSE recommended installation methods like YaST online_update or "zypper patch".

notes.text: A vulnerability found in gnutls. This security flaw happens because of a double free error occurs during verification of pkcs7 signatures in gnutls_pkcs7_verify function.
notes.title: Vulnerability Description
